docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: WHEN 10-year-old Amanda Bagatta of Smithtown was wheeled into the operating room for surgery to remove her tonsils and adenoids, her father went along with her, holding her hand along the way. And he stayed in the operating room until the anesthetic had taken effect.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: BABY BOOMERS brought up on a steady diet of children's cereals in the 1960's and 70's must be struck by the commercials for adult cereals over the last two or three years. Unlike the commercials of their youth, which emphasized fun and tie-ins with television characters, adult cereals trumpet their fiber and dried fruits.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: INTERNATIONAL 2-9 The Communist Party in Rumania will dismantle itself during a special congress that top officials of the ousted Government will call before free elections are held in April. Page 1 Helicopter pilot describes Ceausescu's escape attempt 6
